(I should probably explain my absence.  But I'm not gonna.)

IGL Staff/Sinew/Sequencer/Captain Nemo/Scatterblaster:


Outside of the IGL Sinew hovered, missiles targeted on Grimlock, his sight 
slowly gazing down to confirm what his sensors had told him.  A small armed 
guard was leaving the Otyebis via hatches and they were heavily armed, most 
of their weapons targeted at Grimlock.

"You can stay here and fight, savage, and be killed just as your comrades.  
Or you can trade yourself.  You and one of your people will fight in our 
tournament that does not require the loss of life, and in return we'll let 
the rest go."

---

Sequencer nodded to a technician, who activated a megaphone throughout the 
ship.

"Round Two will begin in ten minutes  Those entered in this free for all are:

Hot Rod 
Scatterblaster
Epyon 
Dragoon
Khonkolor 
Ultimo Campeon
Nightstrike
Hugar.  There may possibly be two more."

---

Armed guards approached all of the contestants, leading them towards the 
center of the huge IGL craft.
